Uses of Interface
info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.Accessor

  • Packages that use Accessor 
    Package Description
    info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator
    Package with tax calculation classes (implements Calculator) and infrastructure to access this classes via String names via Accessor.
    info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw
    Package with classes to access tax calculator classes via year and fluent API.
